 2009-08302009-05-28,  ,  IA&ND,  , 
ActIndian Act
SubjectSAKIMAY INDIAN RESERVE NO. 74-14 - Easement.
PrecisOrder (a) consenting to the use by Saskatchewan Power Corporation, TransGas Limited, Saskatchewan Telecommunications and PMC (Nova Scotia) Company of their statutory power to acquire a right-of-way for electrical transmission system, natural gas transmission pipeline, telecommunication transmission system and oil and petroleum transmission pipeline, and (b) granting them an easement for those purposes, in lieu thereof.
AttachmentsAttachment
